scenes.text: Welcome to Cardiff university Earth and Ocean Sciences society! Join to take part in fun socials with course mates and all our members from across all year groups and disciplines. We look forward to welcoming you.
We don't have a specific day, but specific date and times for socials we run can be found on our SU page

Our membership is Â£5.00 for the year!

Membership benefits include: reduced entrance fee, priority booking for end of year summer ball as well as access to future trip and lecture opportunities and themed event nights.
Being a member opens access to our schools End of Year summer ball , future trip opportunities and much much more.
